extension.name: NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi

extension.summary: The NortheBridge by Design Repository for Kodi features addons such as the acclaimed Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes and upcoming Arctic Zephyr: Generations.
extension.description: The NortheBridge by Design Repository is an exclusive repo curated to contain Arctic Zephyr: Generations and its predecessor, Arctic Zephyr: From Ashes, as well as related enhancements and compatability addons to help build on the AZ:GEN and AZ:FA experience.
extension.disclaimer: Compatible with Kodi 18 or later. Intended for Use with "Arctic Zephyr: Generations." Maintained by NortheBridge North America, L.L.C.
